subject: Re: [junit] Main() never gets called
msgSnippet: ... That s what the OP was doing. The trick is getting past the idea of JUnit tests and just running an application like an application. A slight mental
messageBody:
Justin Knowlden wrote:

> I have never seen Eclipse/JUnit call main() when running a TestCase as a
> JUnit TestCase.
>
> Try calling main() explicitly from your test. I have done this before
> with console based tests.

That's what the OP was doing. The trick is getting past the idea of
"JUnit tests" and just running an application like an application. A
slight mental block, at best.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
